item.title: Porting D to the GBA
item.description: intro [D] is an [excellent language] and we wanted it ported to GBA. the process how it all works example conclusion we now have ability to program in D for GBA!

item.title: rice ideas
item.description: some wip notes on ideas for a new i3 rice. colors same background, but in different color themes, cycling based on time of day or day of the week.
explaining GBA Real-Time Clock (RTC) intro there’s not much documentation online about how the GBA RTC works, so this blog post will attempt to demystify that.
